data.name: Flesh Demo
data.detailed_description: Flesh by @im_oab is a 2D-horizontal (fast pace) shmup game with hand-drawn(ish) animation and an organic/fleshy theme.
data.about_the_game: Flesh by @im_oab is a 2D-horizontal (fast pace) shmup game with hand-drawn(ish) animation and an organic/fleshy theme.
data.short_description: Flesh by @im_oab is a 2D-horizontal (fast pace) shmup game with hand-drawn(ish) animation and organic/fleshy theme.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: osx 10.11+
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
